animeDescription: The hectic daily life of a group of goats living on the Green Pasture, or Qing Qing Grassland (青青草原), and the clumsy wolf who wants to eat them.
animeRelated: ['Side story: Xi Yangyang Yu Hui Tailang: Niu Qi Chong Tian', 'Sequel: Xi Yangyang Yu Hui Tailang: Yangyang Yundonghui', 'Summary: Xi Yangyang Yu Hui Tailang: Yangyang Deyi Xi Yangyang']
